entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: alternate name option for JsonPropertyNameAttribute #74190
  • CI failure: Marshalling of type object is not implemented - Constructor parameters did not have matching fixture data: OleTxFixture fixture #74187
  • `DateTime.Now.ToString("r")` incorrectly attributes GMT #74182
  • CI failure: System.Globalization.Tests.InvariantModeTests.TestLastIndexOf, object reference not set to an instance of an object #74179
    7.0.0
  • CI failure: Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) at System.SZArrayHelper.GetEnumerator #74178
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Build native osx-arm64 versions of the cross compilers #74175
    8.0.0
  • Setting PooledConnectionLifetime on HttpClient handlers created using HttpClientFactory #74173
  • Assertion failed '!varTypeIsFloating(op2Type)' in 'ManagedTests.DynamicCSharp.Conformance.dynamic.dynamicType.conversions.target003.target003.TargetIsPredefinedValueType:NullableDoubleTypeWithNumericConversionFromFloatInAssignment():bool' during 'Generate code' #74172
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Transactions.Local.Tests #74170
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '((-slop) <= diff) && (diff <= slop)' in '<>c__DisplayClass40_0:<InvalidInput_Null>b__0():System.Object:this' during 'Compute edge weights (2, false)' #74169
    7.0.0
  • MachOUtils.cs is not endian-independent. #74163
    Future
  • Assert failed: System.Net.Http.Http3Connection.SendAsync in coreclr Linux_musl x64 Debug #74162
  • cannot validate certificate for 192.168.1.200 because it doesn't contain any IP SANs #74161
    Future
  • [release/6.0] Add Rocky Linux RIDs #74159
  • [RC1] System.AggregateException: One or more errors occurred. (Relative package path exceeds the maximum length (182): MonoToolChainManifest-7.0.100.7.0.0-rc.1.22417.10,version=56.3.47130,chip=arm64,productarch=neutral\Microsoft.NET.Workload.Mono.ToolChain.Manifest-7.0.100.7.0.0-rc.1.22417.10-arm64.msi.) #74151
    7.0.0
  • Determine whether generic math interfaces need to express variance #74148
    7.0.0
  • Tar: symbolic link targets outside extract dir #74140
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json (U)Int128 related APIs #74139
    7.0.0
  • Tar: behavior when extracting entries with leading '/' #74135
    8.0.0
  • dotnet runtime pack command finished leaving running dotnet.exe #74133
    8.0.0
  • InterfaceMap returns non-GenericMethodDefinition for static abstract interface generic methods on the target type #74132
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/ObjectiveC/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI.sh #74130
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'compiler->lvaCallSpCheck != 0xCCCCCCCC && compiler->lvaGetDesc(compiler->lvaCallSpCheck)->lvDoNotEnregister && compiler->lvaGetDesc(compiler->lvaCallSpCheck)->lvOnFrame' in 'Test_skippage5_cs.Program:Test(C):int' during 'Generate code' #74129
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!comp->opts.compJitEarlyExpandMDArrays' in 'AA:Static2():System.Byte[,]' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #74128
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector64Tests.Vector64Int64SumTest #74127
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'unreached' in 'System.Drawing.Graphics:GetContextInfo(byref,bool,byref):this' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #74126
    7.0.0
  • JIT: mono llvmfullaot Linux arm64 release test failure #74125
    8.0.0
  • Test failure in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SyncHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Cancellation_Test.GetAsync_CancelDuringResponseBodyReceived_Unbuffered_TaskCanceledQuickly #74122
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.GetExportCookie #74120
  • Assertion failed 'isGeneralRegister(reg3)' #74117
    7.0.0
  • SignedXmlTest.VerifyXmlResolver sometimes failing due to failing to connect to localhost. #74115

Closed

  • Why is System.Threading.Task.TaskToApm internal? #74201
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Document.Tests.Perf_EnumerateArray.EnumerateUsingIndexer and Hashset.ContainsTrue<Int32> #67101
    7.0.0
  • Memory leak when build X509 chain #74200
  • Hang for x64 runtime on arm64 Windows virtual machine #74003
    7.0.0
  • The state of X509Certificate management with netstandard, xamarin, win & macOS #74194
  • Optimization for large loops. #74171
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Vector256\\Vector256_ro\\Vector256_ro.cmd #70642
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json -> Deserialize Null to Integer Property #74008
  • MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTestExpires5.TestCacheExpiryOrdering test failure #57936
    7.0.0
  • MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTestExpires4.TestCacheShrink test failure #57938
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Json_FromStream<LoginViewModel> #58025
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 and .NET Framework 4.8.1 return different value for `OSArchitecture` when running emulated as x86 #73974
    6.0.x
  • [Windows][libs] ControlledExecutionTests.CancelOnTimeout_ThrowFromCatch Assert.True failure #73739
    7.0.0
  • Test failure - `S.R.Tests.ControlledExecutionTests.CancelOnTimeout_ThrowFromFinally` on ``Libraries Test Run checked coreclr Linux arm64 Debug` #73647
    7.0.0
  • Random failures in System.Numerics.Tests.modpowTest.ModPowAxiom test #70330
    7.0.0
  • superpmi: support Linux arm/arm64 benchmarks collection #59446
    8.0.0
  • Entry names in tar archive have `\\` instead of a single `\` #73791
    8.0.0
  • Open up internal JsonConfigurationFileParser to be public #73946
    Future
  • "[XmlException] Data at the root level is invalid" at xml app.config read since .Net6 #67136
  • Add Rocky Linux RIDs. #74160
  • PropertyInfo.GetCustomAttributes does not respect `inherit` flag, when provided #74149
  • Adding Dictionary<K,V> to XsdDataContractExporter adds KeyValuePair<K,V> as well #67949
  • cannot open include file 'version_info.h' #74060
  • When I use the IP the remote server refuse connection #74093
    Future
  • System.Text.Encoding.Tests.apk test failure #67234
    Future
  • NetworkStream.BeginWrite has different buffer usage safety on Windows and Linux #74050
  • Test failed on powerpc "System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexCultureTests.TurkishI_Is_Differently_LowerUpperCased_In_Turkish_Culture" #68812
    Future
  • [MacCatalyst][libraries] Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core.Tests failures #52851
    Future
  • Bad interaction between the linker and System.Text.Json #74141
  • Why is CompressionLevel in ZipArchive sometimes nullable? #74146
  • Reenable MSQuic subscription into main after .NET 7 fork #73726
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump timout in NativeAOT extra-platforms #74202
  • Try to make tooling happier. #74196
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Bump arcade to 6.0.0-beta.22418.3 #74193
    blocking-release, area-codeflow
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable matching constants for vectors that needs upper half to be save/restore #74192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] App does not Run as a service in a Windows Container #74188
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Hosting, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Improve ControlledExecution tests #74186
    area-System.Runtime
  • Reenable test Runtime_34170 outside of Arm32 runs #74185
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow SIMD-returning calls as arguments #74184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Skip mode check on Android tests when extracting tar files #74183
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix for Random failures in System.Numerics.Tests.modpowTest.ModPowAxiom test #74181
    area-System.Numerics
  • Dependency graph viewer README #74177
    documentation
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [workloads] Shorten the workload name even more #74176
  • Fix ObjectStackAllocationTests JitStress failure #74174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback test #74168
    area-System.Net.Security, needs-author-action
  • Omit the JS sync context if threads are not enabled #74167
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm] Add new javascript API types #74166
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Remove AES and SubtleCrypto from WASM #74165
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [release/6.0] Add Rocky Linux RIDs (#74159) #74164
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use new javascript API in tests and samples #74153
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Don't try to build PGO tools on platforms with no CoreCLR port. #74147
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • Disable failing runtime extra platforms tests #74143
  • [wasm] Reduce allocation when options are passed to fetch #74142
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http
  • Add a way to suppress all trimming warnings #74137
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Ppc64le] bug fixes #74131
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Disable Int128 use in by value ABI scenarios, and fix field layout behavior #74123
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Revert "Update S.R.Metadata in HostModel (#74009)" #74121
    area-HostModel
  • Fix loading of R2R assemblies from byte arrays/streams #74118
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix launching ILCompiler project under debugger #74138
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix for Random failures in System.Numerics.Tests.modpowTest.ModPowAxiom test #74112
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Disable matching constants for vectors that needs upper half to be save/restore #74110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • #52851 Enable/ Skip test case on MacCatalyst #74070
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • Improve ControlledExecution tests #74136
  • Enable linux arm/arm64 superpmi benchmarks collection #74152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Move X.509 certificate tests under S.S.Cryptography #74033
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [release/6.0] Don't lookup the pack without an alias from the workload #74155
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.9
  • [workloads] Shorten the workload name even more #74150
    area-Build-mono
  • Add scheduled runs for release/7.0* on community architectures #74099
    area-Build-mono, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • Add jit stress random #73859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Add a missing AssertMapAndKeyExist to repGetExactClasses #74095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Maui builds to use dotnet rc1 and new dotnet version flow #73624
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Change to GetLastPInvokeError where possible #73980
    area-Meta
  • Skip assertion list look ups where unnecessary #73142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [NativeAOT] Add method parameter names to stack trace if available #74145
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Set CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Checked in corehost #74065
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Move runtimeconfig.template.json stuff to csproj #74144
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix nullable annotations on generic math interfaces #74116
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable Android x86 double related issues #74080
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [NativeAOT] Add method parameter names to stack trace if available #73578
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move runtimeconfig.template.json stuff to csproj #74124
    area-System.Resources
  • [mono] fix Android sample AOT=true build #74092
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • Don't track current field of state machines #74111
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74045
    area-Infrastructure
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: one-sided inference from unrelated predicates #72979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Convert more jit phases to opt into common post phase checks #74041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add intrinsic for IndexOfAny on Arm64 #74010
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc1] net7.0 + net6.0 workload multitargeting changes #74018
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove unnecessary runtime lookup for constrained callvirt #73823
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add JSON Int128 and UInt128 support #73892
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [No Merge] Directory.CreateDirectory: create missing parents using default UnixFileMode. #74002
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use the scoped keyword in LibraryImportGenerator #73479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix R2RDump in the presence of composite images #73979
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve JitDisasm for top-level statements, expose DumpJittedMethods in Release #74090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix one more Crossgen2 field layout mismatch with runtime #73978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix gtGetClassHandle for static fields (R2R only) #74075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Try to keep cache value after startup validation when current Options is default unnamed one #72927
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Do not retype small locals in `FIELD_LIST`s on x86 #74030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Simplify platform macro definitions in PAL #73530
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ignore LoopbackServer exceptions in MaxHeadersLength test #73937
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge remote-tracking branch 'lab-upstream/runtime-main' into feature/hot-cold-splitting #1962

Updated

  • Validation for RuntimeFunctions and change to unwindinfo #1960

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow provide translations for new languages #27257
  • Make it possible to choose a different default RuntimeIdentifier between build and publish for SDKs #27253
  • UseWindowsForms not work on .net framework 2.0 #27249

Closed

  • Compatibility error suppression engine should consider supporting short tfm names #18487
  • Solution-Wide publish profiles #27222

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't run CG in public builds #27269
    Area-Infrastructure
  • added typo correction for `dotnet new` instantiate #27265
    area: dotnet new
  • [23250] - dotnet test boolean flags options fixed #27262
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1952637 #27252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #27250
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27248
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update Blazor WASM Baselines for new files #27201
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove obsolete diagnostic message in ApiCompatRunner #27255
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Fix roslyn assemblies path not being respected #27256
  • Handle error when status runtime information cannot find version in productCollection. #26676
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use Logger and apply fix in AssemblyIdentity rule #27233
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1950820 #27244
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port predownload changes into 6.0.1xx #27208
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port pre-download changes into the 6.0.4xx branch #27178
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Quote file paths for the BrotliCompress tool #27213
    Area-WebSDK
  • Remove custom logic of fetching dotnet dir #26851
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default + Add PublishSelfContained #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update handling of SelfContained and RuntimeIdentifier properties when specified on the command line #21986
    Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27241
    Area-Infrastructure
  • simplify arch for preload library #24870
  • test install-scripts #23812
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add solution filter for template engine #27229
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • String-based enums #2849
  • Champion "Allow `System.Enum` as a constraint" (15.7) #104
    7.3
  • Champion "permit methods in enum declarations" #297
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Attributes on Main for top level programs #5045
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler should error for `ModuleInitializer` on `static abstract` member #63481
  • Feature "Symbol Finder" is unavailable due to an internal error. #63479
    17.4
  • Nullable field state may be carried over unexpectedly in foreach loops #63478
    Backlog
  • bug: Sync Namespace is not updating partial class #63477
    Backlog
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #63476
    Backlog
  • AnalyzerOptions.AdditionalFiles are not deterministically ordered #63475
  • IDE0220 on foreach (Match m in regex.Matches) – Should Not Occur #63470
  • "Scoped" word is forbidden since MSBuild version 17.3.0+92e077650 #63469
    17.4
  • IDE0200 (lambda expression can be removed) results in compile error (partial method) #63465
  • IDE0200 (lambda expression can be removed) results in compile error (ConditionalAttribute) #63464
  • Generic type parameter csproj reference requirements changed (CS0012) #63463

Closed

  • Public API to compare symbols across different compilations #62465
    C# 12.0
  • Rename doesn't work on the properties associated with positional parameters/primary constructor parameters in records #63455
  • Helix test runner does not optimally partition tests between work items #62036
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Editorconfig valueholder #63483
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move Windows builds to new images #63482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • IDE0220 (foreach cast): Consider T of IEnumerable<T> for weakly-typed GetEnumerator for CorLib types #63472
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix regression in analyzer partial analysis state tracking #63468
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers
  • When we're removing the last project, fire SolutionRemoved #63458
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Break out src/Tools in the CODEOWNERs file for more granular ownership #63480
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert and fix the stackoverflow when search local function. #63473
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Pass SolutionServices in more places" #63474
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused variable #63471
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Delete broken median calculation #63459
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify File-Rename code #63456
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Added missing backtick to breaking changes #63467
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Add assert back #63437
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Inline local in Program.Main refactoring #63451
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add return types to SymbolKey creation and resolution #63304
    Area-IDE
  • ConvertToRecord: Property and Method analysis #63320
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63406
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Regression test for ref struct in iterator #63415
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle nested non-deconstruction conversions in DeconstructionInfo #63435
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - Class Snippet #63402
    Area-IDE
  • Handle `[UnscopedRef] scoped` in source and metadata #63134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Do symbol mapping in Go To Def #63439
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Grpc.JsonTranscoding requires manually copying annotations.proto and http.proto into projects #43376
  • Quarantine Interop.FunctionalTests.Http3.Http3RequestTests.GET_ConnectionsMakingMultipleRequests_AllSuccess #43374
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, plaintext #43373
  • Reload Blazor UI #43370
  • EndpointFilter better handling for IActionResult #43369
  • BindProperty silently fails when used with a "private set" property #43368
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Calling Blazor functions from javascript does not work as expected #43367
  • Error MSB6006: "dotnet.exe" exited with code 1 #43366
  • Blazor: Deadlock when chaining TaskCompletionSource via ContinueWith #43364
  • Request for further clarification of scope/impact of #40071 - i.e. automatic inference of injected API controller parameters #43363
  • Make "NonDisposableStream" as public. #43362
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, mvc #43361
  • OpenApi analyzers do not recognize returns in ternary expressions #43356
    7.0-rc2

Closed

  • Consider adding an IEndpointConventionBuilder.RequireAuthorization overload that accepts an AuthorizationPolicy #18497
    .NET 7 Planning
  • OpenAPI convention on route group cannot examine endpoint-specific metadata #42750
    7.0-rc1
  • System.ArgumentException in RouteHandlerAnalyzer with Minimal API #41794
    7.0-rc2
  • Don't run GenerateMvcTestManifestTask if IsPublishable == false #42966
    7.0-rc2
  • Perf improvement: https, json_actix, mvc #43284
  • Why does ForwardedHeadersMiddleware remove headers from the request?! #43344
  • Visual Studio/ Blazor - resx files improperly nested under razor.cs #43342
  • Custom ModelBinder and complex objects deserialization #43095
  • What cause error "A connection that was expected to be kept alive was closed by the server" #43287
  • Customise blazor-error-ui at runtime #43318
  • [Blazor WASM] Caching problem leading to service worker update problems #39016
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Incorrect URL decoding, '%3A' character is mistakenly replaced with ':' #42859
  • System.NullReferenceException at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpRequest.get_Cookies() #43155

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove use of Expression.Constant in RequestDelegateFactory #43380
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Register authz middleware for Blazor Server IndAuth #43375
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • Code cleanup: Removing a superfluous switch block #43372
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [7.0-rc1] Fix PopulateCertificatesFromStore on macOS to only return store certs #43358

Merged

  • Adjust shared framework and targeting pack tests to check _all_ assembly versions #43359
    area-infrastructure
  • Perf-up the AuthZ! #43268
    community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • Store and reuse client certificate task #43270
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add support for running final conventions during build #43225
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Stop setting content length 0 on 204s in MVC #43360
    area-web-frameworks

  • Backport parts of 48a81a70597f #43357

Updated

  • Support LF request line terminator in HttpParser #43202
    area-runtime
  • Don't throw TaskCanceledException in RateLimitingMiddleware #43320
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Improve vary-by rules #43257
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43354
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] OnAppearing only called on 1st tab of AppShell home page #9531
  • Maui showing this when building #9528
  • UpdateSourceEventName doesn't work #9527
    Backlog
  • ResourceDictionary loaded from rd.xaml does not expose any entries #9526
    .NET 7
  • [Windows] Scrolled event is triggered with some delays when scrolling using mouse pad #9524
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI - CollectionView SelectedItem binding functions on Windows but not Android platform #9523
    Backlog
  • [MAC/iOS] Enabling RightToLeft for scroll view at the run time is not working #9518
    Backlog
  • Why Entry and Button that are covered by other layout can still get the focus. #9514
  • TabbedPage for Android with child navigation shows the Tabbar #9512
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: 'setSpan ( ... ) ends beyond length #9418
    Backlog
  • Review the performance implications of using a Concurrent Dictionary inside WrappedServiceProvider #8128
    .NET 7
  • MAUI Flyout page leaves visual artefact on Android when changing pages #9495
  • .NET MAUI installation bug: The target platform identifier android/ios/maccatalyst was not recognized #9498
  • Why does System.IO.Directory.Exists return false when viewing Mac path in .net Maui? #9494
  • On Windows some controls won't show image icons #9502
  • Cannot Upload MAUI Archive to Apple App Store #9507
  • Android MauiWebView Layout issue #9517
  • .Net Maui Preferences.Get Returns Null instead of defaultValue on Windows Machine #9499
  • Global resources when using linked ResourceDictionaries - not able to use from code behind #9513
  • Picker ItemSource not working on Windows #9516
  • Messed up Appearing/Disappearing events in Maui Pages #9497
  • When developing maui apps ,application toolbar missing. #9501
  • Unable to activate Windows Store app - The parameter is incorrect #9500
  • Create and Publish android APK for .NET MAUI Blazor #9511
  • Android: When opening the app by clicking on a push notification, Application.OnResume is not called. #9290
  • Running various Samples in .NET MAUI source code. #9283

PullRequests

Created

  • Wire up scene life cycle events #9525
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix default corner radius on Button #9515
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • Pin SDK to stable 6.0.400 #9532
  • Make sure cursor doesn't go out of bounds when setting Entry/Editor text #9521
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr5

Updated

  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Propagate semantic properties from FlyoutItem #9270
  • Update Package.appxmanifest to have PhonePublisherId #9477
    partner/winui, do-not-merge, community ✨
  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Implement SkiaImage Save #9125
    area/drawing ✏️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9509
    area/single project ☝️, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr5

entry.content:

Created

PullRequests

Created

  • ExecuteDelete: Always generate Any form #28781

Merged

    auto-merge
